threads.name: Anonymous
threads.com:
/vmg/ is a place to discuss all types of mobile games, including both Android and iOS, phones and tablets. Please note that Nintendo and Sony handhelds are considered consoles, and that threads pertaining to those platforms and their gaming titles should be posted elsewhere.

Does this mean discussion of mobile games is banned on other video game boards? No! /vmg/ is just a separate board specifically focused on mobile games where discussions about your favorite games can thrive.

Please familiarize yourself with the rules and remember to use the spoiler function where appropriate!

Please note that, like /v/, "Generals"—long-term, one-after-the-other, recurring threads about a specific game are not permitted on /vmg/. Such threads belong on >>>/vg/

Ovenbreak
>Happy 6-Year Anniversary! Birthday Cake Cookie content guaranteed!

>Level 6 Legendary Gift - Level your legends!
>Raid Quests - DIY!
>Draw Boost - Get special containers for opening special containers!

>New Treasure Trial despite the fact it's leaving!

Kingdom
>Braver Together! BTS Crossover event that last until... January 19!?

>BTS CONCERT: RHYTHM STAGE! Like 3 lane autorunners combined with rhythm games! It's incredibly hard and might need some fixing!
>Halloween Bingo and Halloween night Challenges for folks in retirement for Eery rewards!
>Meet Schwarzwälder (A.K.A. Choco Brute Cake Hound)! A Charge "Cookie" who is incredibly good for both offense and defense! Banner ends in 32 days!

They're technically the second best class at frontlining, but they're nowhere close to how tanky most tanks are. They do more damage of course, but also not as much damage as mages/hunters/assassins.
The only exception to both of these is Leonlev, she does a LOT of damage with her ult, and her passive immortality can cause her to stay alive for the entire fight despite dropping to 1hp right at the start. last_replies.name: Anonymous
last_replies.com:
>>1053659
Disco Patch is pretty good, her Ultra Skill is only 2 cost so it builds up fairly quick, and it debuffs the enemy to take more damage. She also has a 10% block rate and buffs her damage by 20% for 10 seconds after a block, stacking up to 3 times, but it also affects other fighters at half value. She's a mandatory pick for 5 Fighter teams, but also seems pretty decent on physical teams for the debuff.

Qing I'm less familiar with as she's new and I only have her at 5*. She seems to be a pure DPS with a very minor trait in reducing debuff durations on nearby fighters. She also tanks for Aibo specifically which is... a thing.

If you're semi invested then you'll find that you're simultaneously not good enough for top ladder, but also don't have enough content (e.g challenges and cards, which are usually weekly and biannually respectively ).

>>1051126
fast, explosive satellites
melting lava zones, volcanic crater meteors
you basically pick up everything that benefits mana gain, and explosion radius and damage (arcane effuse, gunpowder, energy core, war magic, cauldron etc)
the icing on the cake is getting nuclear fission, but that's rng heavy
i always pick shield lv1 and full size electric zone because they are great to protect against stray damage

shit like armageddon, arcane ray and energy bullets can be 100% ignored, hell i would personally avoid magic bullets and spirits too and focus on stuff that has good synergy with the cauldron, like the fireballs or incinerate flamestrike
